data.name: HrTitle
data.value: Human Resources Consulting and Team Development

data.name: HrQuestion
data.value: How can I help your company?

data.name: HrText
data.value: I design strategic selection processes based on values, competencies, and alignment with organizational culture. I support the integration of new talent and the development of high-performance teams, prioritizing internal communication and emotional well-being.

data.name: HrBenefit2
data.value: Personnel selection with higher accuracy and lower turnover.

data.name: HrBenefit3
data.value: Improved work climate and internal talent development.

data.name: HrBenefit4
data.value: More human, conscious processes aligned with objectives.
